core.view package¶

core.view.menu module¶

main_menu(research: classes.Research.Research)¶

Function that displays the main menu of OPSE in CLI.

Parameters

research (Research) – The research associated.

menu_display_data_in_profile_dict(dict_values: dict, display_name: str = 'Menu :')¶

Function that builds dynamically a menu using an OPSE functionality.

Parameters

  • dict_values (dict) – The dict to show.

  • display_name (str, optional) – The menu name, defaults to “Menu :”

menu_display_profiles(research: classes.Research.Research)¶

Function that displays the menu to list profiles to the user.

Parameters

research (Research) – The research associated.

menu_merge_manual_profile(research: classes.Research.Research)¶

Function that displays the merge menu to the user.

Parameters

research (Research) – The research associated.

menu_remove_profile(research: classes.Research.Research)¶

Function that displays the remove menu to the user.

Parameters

research (Research) – The research associated.

menu_update_data_visibility(research: classes.Research.Research)¶

Function that displays the menu to update data visibility to the user.

Parameters

research (Research) – The research associated.
